author: Reuters Editorial
title: Germania colloca 3,991 mld nuovo Schatz marzo 2020, rendimento sale a -0,51% Bond |
text: Feb 20 (Reuters) - German Finance Agency, the federal government's debt management office, sold 3.991 billion euros of its new 0.00 percent, 2-year Schatz notes at the lowest price of 101.06, the Bundesbank said on Tuesday. The notes (ISIN:DE0001104719) are due to mature on March 13, 2020. The settlement date is Feb 22. Results of Jan 23 sale included for reference: AUCTION DATE 20/02/18 23/01/18 AVG. YIELD -0.51 pct -0.61 pct AVG. ACCEPTED PRICE 101.065 101.154 LOWEST ACCEPTED PRICE 101.06 101.14 TAIL 0.005 0.014 TOTAL BIDS 4.975 bln euros 4.32 bln euros ALLOTTED 3.991 bln euros 4.033 bln euros RETAINED 1.009 bln euros 0.968 bln euros BID COVER RATIO 1.2 1.1 TOTAL VOLUME 5.0 bln euros 13.0 bln euros Auction details in German can be found at .
